verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: celebrated] [ARG1: the Republican tax reform bill] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] , [ARGM-PRD: reveling in a major legislative win just days before Christmas] .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] celebrated the Republican tax reform bill on Friday , [V: reveling] [ARG1: in a major legislative win] [ARGM-TMP: just days before Christmas] .
